name: Sesame-crusted Fish Fillets

ingredients.name: (6 oz/170 g) white fish fillets (haddock, sole, cod or halibut)

preparation: Whisk orange juice and Thai Seasoning together in a mixing bowl.
Season fish with Sea Salt and Pepper. Brush both sides with orange juice mixture.
Place sesame seeds on a large plate. Gently press both sides of fish into seeds to coat.
Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner, or in a frying pan. Broil 6 minutes on each side or until golden.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with steamed rice and veggies.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
